mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employment_application(post_id, teacher_id, resume_url, resume_name, resume_size, create_time) VALUES(#{postId}, #{teacherId}, #{resumeUrl}, #{resumeName}, #{resumeSize}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id, teacher_id, resume_url, resume_name, resume_size, create_time FROM employment_application ORDER BY create_time DESC, id DESC
